The misleading post was published on Fac: 2019 and has been shared more than 30,000 times.
The post claimed that Thailand: s Prime Minister had classified sanitary pads as luxury items and imposed high taxes on them.
The post included a photo of Thailand: s Prime Minister, with text superimposed on the photo stating that sanitary pads were categorized as luxury items and subject to a 40% tax.
The Thai government released an official: 2019, clarifying that there is no excise tax imposed on sanitary pads and that they are not considered luxury items.
